text.section: In this title the following words have the meanings indicated.

section.section: "Contest" does not include a mixed martial arts exhibition.

text.section:
"Mixed martial arts" means a competition in which contestants use interdisciplinary forms of fighting, including various forms of martial arts, involving:
striking with the hands, feet, knees, or elbows; and
grappling by take-downs, throws, submissions, or choke holds.

"Mixed martial arts exhibition" means mixed martial arts where:
contact to the body is permitted in only a restrained manner;
contact to the head is not permitted; and
no contact is permitted that may result, or is intended to result, in physical harm to an opponent.
